类 MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • MainFrame
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    the main frame of the UDP chat containing menu, tool bar, infomation panel, controlling panel It also includes the UDP transfer part.
    版本:
    6.2
    作者:
    Changdi Chen
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明
      class  MainFrame.ColorAction
      action to change background color
      class  MainFrame.ConfigAction
      file - configuration call the configuration panel
      class  MainFrame.ConfigListener
      it will call the configuration panel.
      class  MainFrame.ContactButtonListener
      it will recognize which contactors is chosen.
      class  MainFrame.Contactors
      all the network information of contactors
      class  MainFrame.FindNearbyListener
      This action calls StartFinding it will actively search all nearby users by broadcasting.
      class  MainFrame.LinkListener
      deal with linking to another host
      class  MainFrame.MaintainingConnection
      preparing, transferring settings from server to client. the first "handshake" between two contactors.
      class  MainFrame.MyFireButtonListener
      this action allows the cell button to switch between red and green ( may be useful in future versions.)
      class  MainFrame.PrepareListener
      this action will call a new thread and start StartServerReceivingudp(). transfer settings from server to client. the first handshake between two players
      class  MainFrame.SendAction
      send the message in the text area to opponents.
      class  MainFrame.sendmessageListener
      send the message in the text area to opponents.
      class  MainFrame.StartFinding
      it enables active searching nearby users by broadcasting.
      class  MainFrame.StartServerReceiving
      TCP version handle all the message received and the take actions.
      class  MainFrame.StartServerReceivingudp
      UDP version handle all the message received and the take actions.
      class  MainFrame.SwitchesListener
      a swich button which can switch between single mode and multiple mode
      class  MainFrame.Translating
      A Thread which always detect is there new information need to be translated.

      • CreateTextboxesudp

        public void CreateTextboxesudp​(int i,
